C

Cell - Class in pentago
Determines a cell in the othello game board
Cell() - Constructor for class pentago.Cell
Default construvtor of cell class
Cell(Cell) - Constructor for class pentago.Cell
Copy constructor of cell class
changeTurn() - Method in class pentago.Pentago
Determines next turn of the game and changes Pentago.turn respectively by simply giving turn to the other player.
checkColumnWin(Piece) - Method in class pentago.Board
Checks piece win state in column direction.
checkDiagonalWin(Piece) - Method in class pentago.Board
Checks piece win state in diagonal direction.
checkRowWin(Piece) - Method in class pentago.Board
Checks piece win state in row direction.
ClockwiseRotation - Class in pentago
Anti-clockwise rotation simulator class.
ClockwiseRotation() - Constructor for class pentago.ClockwiseRotation
 
ComputerPlayer - Class in pentago
Determines a semi-intelligent computer player that can choose its next move and rotation based on Minimax decision rule.
ComputerPlayer(Board, MiniMax) - Constructor for class pentago.ComputerPlayer
Constructor that initializes player.
convertNextMoveToBoardNumber(String) - Static method in class pentago.MoveStringConverter
Converts move string to block and cell number.
convertToMoveString(int, int) - Static method in class pentago.MoveStringConverter
Converts input block and cell number to move string.
convertToRotationString(int, boolean) - Static method in class pentago.MoveStringConverter
Converts block number and rotation to rotation string.
